tool_description: MotoGP API that gives you in-depth stats/summary and detailed information about all riders and teams. The only API you'll ever need.
name: MotoGP
title: MotoGP

api_list.name: Get all events from a season id [Events mean all completed and pending races]
api_list.description: Get all events from a season id [Events mean all completed and pending races]

api_list.name: Get all riders of a season [Requires Rider category and season year]
api_list.description: Get all riders of a season [Requires Rider category and season year]

api_list.name: Get all rider categories for a season
api_list.description: Get all rider categories for a season

api_list.name: Get rider details by id
Get summary of a rider by id
api_list.description: Get summary of a rider by id

api_list.name: Get statistics of a rider
Get rider information by name
Get race result from a race session [Race session id is required]
api_list.description: Get race result from a race session [Race session id is required]

api_list.name: Get all categories from an event [Category is required to get race data]
api_list.description: Get all categories from an event [Category is required to get race data]

api_list.name: Get all seasons [Required for Race Data]
api_list.description: Get all seasons [Required for Race Data] - This gives you a season id from which you can get all events
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motogp2.p.rapidapi.com/get_all_seasons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motogp2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get race sessions from category id and event id [Race sessions - Race/Sprint Race/FP1/FP2...]
api_list.description: Get race sessions from category id and event id [Race sessions - Race/Sprint Race/FP1/FP2...]

api_list.name: Get all available seasons
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motogp2.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/get_all_seasons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motogp2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://motogp2.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/get_all_seasons"
